Bash(/Users/yangfan/Documents/coding/DownloadQRcode/quick_check.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash

echo "=========================================="
echo "  EduQR Lite - 快速部署检查"
echo "=========================================="
echo ""

expect << 'EXPECT_EOF'
set timeout 30
spawn ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@182.254.159.223
expect "password:"
send "Yf19910201.\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "cd ~/eduqr-lite\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "echo '=== Docker 版本 ==='\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "sudo docker --version\\r"
expect {
    "password" {
        send "Yf19910201.\\r"
    }
}

expect "~]#"

send "echo ''\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "echo '=== 容器状态 ==='\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "sudo docker ps -a\\r"
expect {
    "password" {
        send "Yf19910201.\\r"
    }
}

expect "~]#"

send "echo ''\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "echo '=== 健康检查 ==='\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "curl -s localhost:8000/health || echo '服务未响应'\\r"
expect "~]#"

send "exit\\r"
expect eof
EXPECT_EOF

echo ""
echo "=========================================="
echo "  检查完成"
echo "=========================================="
echo ""
echo "如果看到服务未响应，请手动启动："
echo "  ssh ubuntu@182.254.159.223"
echo "  cd ~/eduqr-lite"
echo "  sudo docker-compose up -d --build"
echo ""
EOF)
